About Us

Khair Rafiq Technical Services LLC (KR Tech) specialises in multiple technical projects of maintenance for interiors and exteriors. Our professional teams provide technical and non-technical services in different fields. These dedicated teams are a mix of multitalented and multi-skilled experienced professionals. These teams do their best in accomplishing their tasks to assure customer satisfaction.

Our Objectives

To provide all technical services and solutions to its clients at par excellence with full satisfaction and confidence and build high reputation and trust for continued business relationship

Our Vision

To be the leader in technical services sector by providing high quality services as a client oriented company

Our Mission

We are committed to achieve and maintain clients’ satisfaction and trust as a passion

Core Values

Performance excellence in all activities and in dealing with clients

Responsiveness (timely response to clients’ needs with focus)

Integrity (demonstrate a high level of sincerity, honesty and fairness)

Dedication in serving clients with dignity and determination

Empowerment of staff with responsibility, authority and teamwork
